PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... belabour v． （过份冗长地）做或说，痛打 beleaguer v． 围攻 belie v． 掩饰，证明为假.
beldame 恶婆beleaguer 围belecture 谆谆教诲

list.abs: crucially , adjustments are happening swiftly in areas that beleaguered companies tackled only slowly during the last slump , as bloated workforces and excessive capacity .至关重要的是，在那些处于困境的公司仅缓慢地应对了最近的一次不景气的地区，它们迅速地进行调整，如对膨胀的劳动力和过度的生产能力。
but that may not be enough to help beleaguered consumers and businesses get a flagging recovery back on track .不过，这可能不足以帮助陷入困境的消费者和企业使乏力的复苏恢复势头。

if you can put a beleaguered a beleaguered company , group , any of these companies to work , you're talking about Ford , GM , Chrysler , it's really terrific .如果你能让一个陷入困境的公司，团队，任何这样的公司开始运转，你会谈论福特，通用，克莱斯勒，这真的很令人震惊。

soaring oil prices are fuelling a growing international market for aircraft parts as beleaguered airlines around the world back operations or liquidate assets .不断飙升的油价正推动国际飞机零部件市场不断增长，因为全球各地陷于困境的航空公司缩减业务规模或清理资产。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Dutch belegeren 'camp round', from be- ('all) about' + leger 'a camp'

sentences.sentence: "The children teased the boy because of his stammer"

means.word_mean: 2. surround so as to force to give up;

sentences.cn: 我们被许多困难所困扰。
